objenome.goal

Class AdjustedFitnessFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • objenome.solver.evolve.AbstractFitnessFunction
      • objenome.goal.AdjustedFitnessFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Listener<ConfigEvent>, FitnessFunction, GPContainer.GPContainerAware

    public class AdjustedFitnessFunction
extends AbstractFitnessFunction
implements Listener<ConfigEvent>, GPContainer.GPContainerAware
    A fitness function for that calculates and assigns adjusted fitness scores. The fitness scores are calculated by passing evaluation to a delegate fitness function, which must return an instance of DoubleFitness.Minimise. This value is then converted to standardised fitness by removing any offset of the values (so the minimum possible score is 0.0) and then converted to adjusted fitness using the following formula:
    adjusted-fitness = 1 / (1 + standardised-fitness)
    When using this fitness function the MINIMUM_FITNESS_SCORE config option can optionally be set, or the same value set using the mutator method provided. If set, the MINIMUM_FITNESS_SCORE is used to convert the delegate's calculated values to standardised fitness. For example, if the minimum fitness score is 10.0, and the delegate assigns a fitness value of 11.0, then the standardised fitness will be 1.0. In the same example, the adjusted fitness would then be calculated as 0.5 using the formula above. If the MINIMUM_FITNESS_SCORE config option is not set, then it is assumed the delegates calculation is already standardised.
    Since:
    2.0

        public AdjustedFitnessFunction(AbstractFitnessFunction delegate,
                               boolean autoConfig)
        Constructs a AdjustedFitnessFunction fitness function with control parameters initially loaded from the config. If the autoConfig argument is set to true then the configuration will be automatically updated when the config is modified.
        Parameters:
        autoConfig - whether this operator should automatically update its configuration settings from the config

    • Method Detail

      • setConfig

        public void setConfig(GPContainer config)
        Sets up this operator with the appropriate configuration settings. This method is called whenever a ConfigEvent occurs for a change in any of the following configuration parameters:
        • MINIMUM_FITNESS_SCORE
        Specified by:
        setConfig in interface GPContainer.GPContainerAware

      • onEvent

        onEvent in interface Listener<ConfigEvent>
        Parameters:

      • evaluate

        public DoubleFitness.Maximise evaluate(Population population,
                                       Organism individual)
        Calculates the adjusted fitness of the given individual. The adjusted fitness is a double value between 0.0 and 1.0, where 1.0 is a correct solution. The evaluation of individuals is delegated to the AbstractFitnessFunction supplied to the constructor as the delegate. The values returned by the delegate are converted to adjusted fitness before being returned. The fitness returned will be an instance of DoubleFitness.Maximise.
        Specified by:
        evaluate in class AbstractFitnessFunction
        Parameters:
        individual - the program to evaluate
        Returns:
        a DoubleFitness.Maximise which is the adjusted fitness of the given individual
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the delegate returns anything other than an instance of DoubleFitness.Minimise

      • adjustedFitness

        protected static double adjustedFitness(double standardised)
        Converts the given standardised fitness score to an adjusted fitness score, between 0.0 and 1.0. This is calculated as 1.0 / (1.0 + standardised) as defined by Koza in Genetic Programming.
        Parameters:
        standardised - the standardised fitness score - this must be 0.0 or greater
        Returns:
        a double which is the adjusted fitness score between 0.0 and 1.0, where 1.0 is more fit than 0.0

      • getMinimumFitnessScore

        public double getMinimumFitnessScore()
        Returns the minimum fitness score that an individual can obtain using the delegate. This is used to convert the delegate's fitness scores to standardised fitness by removing the offset.
        Returns:
        the minimum fitness score that the delegate can assign

      • setMinimumFitnessScore

        public void setMinimumFitnessScore(double minFitnessScore)
        Sets the minimum fitness score than an individual can be assigned by the delegate. this is used to convert the delegate's fitness score to standardised fitness by removing the amount the scores are offset from 0.0. If automatic configuration is enabled then any value set here will be overwritten by the MINIMUM_FITNESS_SCORE configuration setting on the next config event.
        Parameters:
        minFitnessScore - the minimum fitness score that the delegate can assign
